div.div: Gustavus Adolphus vs. Saint John's Univ.

tr.td: Gustavus won the toss and will receive the opening kickoff.
Zach Barwick kickoff 51 yards to the GAC14, D. Fredericksen return 12 yards to the GAC26 (Mack Short).
Karim Ortiz rush for 3 yards to the GAC29 (Drake Matuska; JPietruszewski).
Mitch Hendricks rush for 4 yards to the GAC33, out-of-bounds (Peyton Thiry).
Mitch Hendricks pass incomplete to Matt Boyce.
Casey Decker punt 38 yards to the SJU29, Josh Bungum return 0 yards to the SJU29, fumble by Josh Bungum recovered by SJU Josh Bungum at SJU26.
Saint John's Univ. drive start at 13:59, SJU ball on SJU26.
PENALTY SJU false start 5 yards to the SJU21.
Sam Sura rush for 1 yard to the SJU22 (Kysten Zierke; Tyler Jakes).
Nick Martin pass complete to Josh Bungum for 20 yards to the SJU42 (A. Moorhouse).
Nick Martin pass incomplete to Josh Bungum.
Sam Sura rush for 6 yards to the SJU48 (Kysten Zierke; Tyler Jakes).
Sam Sura rush for no gain to the SJU48 (Tyler Jakes).
Griffin Toomey punt 27 yards to the GAC25, downed.
